title: So i was in a game
body: And my internet dropped out for 30 seconds, about 15 minutes in and when i re logged to reconnect, the game wasn't in my match history, it wasn't available to reconnect to like it normally is. Rito help explain where my match went please

replies.body:
Someone hacked you.
Change your password.
Go into your logs and send them to riot, try and remember who was in your game.
List there summoner name and what they were playing.

in your riot folder go:
"Logs" - "Game- R3D Logs"

you will see alot of note docs that say something like "2015-07-26T02-18-45_r3dlog"
Find the most recent ones, and send them to riot.
or. like the other cases of this, the actual game dropped out and everyone dc, so the game is canceled and unrecorded
